body.p: Filled with newfound confidence, the swan returned to the farm, where his siblings and the other animals were playing by the pond. This time, they gazed at him in wonder, amazed by his beauty and grace.
“Look at that stunning swan!” they exclaimed.
“I’m not ugly, guys! I just have a different dad than you!” the once-ugly duckling explained.

fig.title: The Ugly Duckling Reunites With His Siblings

image.alt: Cartoon image of swans and ducks on pond

body.p: The ugly duckling, now a swan, realized that he was not ugly at all—he was simply different. With a heart full of joy, he joined the other swans, finally feeling a sense of belonging.
